title: Unable to connnect
body: Game loading screen was all black. Got a message that I was unable to connect to server. a few minutes later hit with leaver(remake). Anyone else?

replies.body: If you're still having this issue, I recommend going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  While we did have server issues yesterday, I want to make sure your network is in good health as black screens represent a failure to download assets on the game server.
